act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.pinyin: Nǐ jiā yīgòng yǒu jǐ kǒu rén?

item.hanzi: 我家一共四口人，我的爸妈、我，加上我的弟弟。
item.pinyin: Wǒ jiā yīgòng sì kǒu rén, wǒ de bàmā, wǒ, jiāshàng wǒ de dìdi.
Nǐ de dìdi jǐ suì le?
Tā jīnnián shí suì, zài shàng xiǎoxué.

item.hanzi: 就在家里附近，他学习很认真。
item.pinyin: Jiù zài jiā lǐ fùjìn, tā xuéxí hěn rènzhēn.
